body_html: @andrewharp I benchmarked it and the res/raw solution comes back on average in just under a second with a best time average around .5 seconds. The assets solution never comes back any where near that fast on average, with around 1.2-1.3seconds. Could you live with the idea that if you want to use the overloaded create that uses a memmap, you need to move your files over to res/raw? Not that big a deal. You also have to remove the file extension, and I could add a check for that.

The assets solution never comes back any where near that fast on average, with around 1.2-1.3seconds.
